channel.title: Avalonia on The imposter syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Avalonia on The imposter syndrome

item.title: First date with AvaloniaUI
item.description: Wow, it has really been a long time without posting here! 8 months! Lots of (good) things happening in my personal life so I decided to just write here once I really have something to write about. Something that engages me. And here I am! Last summer I had to hire a new senior developer for my team and during the interview process, one profile got our attention in a particular way.
